purpose: To provide an AI-driven calendar that intelligently manages user schedules, enhancing time management and productivity.
principle: Utilizes AI algorithms to analyze and optimize scheduling by learning user preferences and priorities.
reusability: Offers integration with existing calendar systems via APIs, supports customization for different scheduling needs.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited features and potential bugs. Integration with certain calendar platforms might be limited.
name: zero-calendar
description: Zero Calendar is an open-source AI-native calendar that manages your schedule intelligently, giving you more time for what matters.
highlight: AI-native calendar that intelligently manages and optimizes your schedule.
